document.full_text: bb biotech, one of the biggest investors in actelion, is backing the swiss drugmaker's board and management in a battle with activist hedge fund elliott advisors, according to the financial times.
document.title: bb biotech backs actelion in fight with elliott
lines_and_colors: bb biotech, one of the biggest investors in actelion, is backing the swiss drugmaker's board and management in a battle with activist hedge fund elliott advisors, according to the financial times.
